_comment: ShopInformation Database Schema - Use this structure for your backend class

shopInfo.description: string - Short description of the shop
shopInfo.address: string - Full address (e.g., '123 Đường ABC, Quận 1, TP HCM')
shopInfo.foundedYear: number - Year the shop was founded (e.g., 2015)
shopInfo.aboutText: string - Long form about text for the About page
shopInfo.closedDay: string - Special hours or closed day (e.g., 'Chủ Nhật từ 9:00 - 19:00')
shopInfo.mapEmbedUrl: string - Google Maps embed iframe src URL
shopInfo.createdAt: timestamp - When the record was created
shopInfo.updatedAt: timestamp - When the record was last updated
